text: Carlos Heitor Cony (March 14, 1926 â€“ January 5, 2018) was a Brazilian journalist and writer. He was a member of the Brazilian Academy of Letters (Portuguese: Academia Brasileira de Letras). He was born in Rio de Janeiro. Cony was a center-leftist and faced persecution under the military government in the 1960s. Four of his works were adapted to movies. He was a columnist at the Brazilian newspaper Folha de S.Paulo.Carlos' at Folha de S.Paulo Cony died in Rio de Janeiro on January 5, 2018 of multiple organ failure at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *Folha *Mertin-litag *BBC * Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro
